name: @meeting-tools/sdk
description: SDK for interacting with @baas.mdc API and registering clients with @mpc.mdc

scripts.openapi:generate: openapi-generator-cli generate -i tmp/openapi-fixed.json -g typescript-axios -o src/generated/baas -c openapi-generator-config.json --skip-validate-spec
scripts.openapi:rebuild: pnpm openapi:clean && pnpm openapi:generate && pnpm build
scripts.tools:rebuild: pnpm build && pnpm tools:generate && pnpm tools:register
